messages.message: For OAuth tokens, can we automatically delete tokens on expiration? I see this token that's been expired for a while now
I just saw the refresh button, maybe we could have the refresh button closer to the expiration time so that users can see it right away

I think for usability it's probably better that the expired token still be visible so that if a token stops working and you go to this page, you can clearly see why it's not working rather than the token just vanishing.

Agree that we can make it more obvious that it's expired and they need to refresh though.  @hannah @Siya?
Yes agree we shouldn't auto delete - what if we just make the text red with expired?
